title.narrative: Rural Development: Project for Adaption to Climate Change in the Mekong Delta in Ben Tre and Tra Vinh Provinces

description.narrative: The Objective of the project is to 'strengthen the adaptive capacity of target communities and institutions to better contend with climate change".
